abstract: Lou Simpson, who oversees investments at Geico and was long considered a possible successor to Warren Buffett at Berkshire Hathaway, is retiring at the end of the year, Berkshire said on Monday.

lead_paragraph: Lou Simpson, who oversees investments at Geico and was long considered a possible successor to Warren Buffett at Berkshire Hathaway, is retiring at the end of the year, Mr. Buffett told The Chicago Tribune on Monday.

headline.main: Lou Simpson to Retire From Berkshire
